titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that family members and others should support all individuals affected by breast cancer.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

bill.summary: 5/10/1996--Introduced. Declares the sense of the Congress that: (1) the people of the Nation should support individuals with breast cancer and their family members and other loved ones; and (2) the family members and other loved ones should support each other as well as such individuals.
